file_content.text: [An elaborate script is carved into the stone. You scan it and let your datapad translate.]
Heed the words of Jedek-To. You will not like them. I do not like them.
The last Gormak must not die. There was no discussion. The interpretation was clear.
If every Gormak dies, every Voss dies. This is true.
Wage war but do not win. Survive. For total victory is death.
